amendment.description: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide penalties for aiming laser pointers at airplanes, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 8 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 1. Record Vote Number: 10.

action.text: Amendment SA 8 proposed by Senator Whitehouse. (consideration: CR S475-477; text: CR S475-476) To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide penalties for aiming laser pointers at airplanes, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 8 proposed by Senator Whitehouse.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 8 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 1. Record Vote Number: 10.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 8 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 1. Record Vote Number: 10.
